t: Jujyfruits
s: Sink your teeth into fruity flavor with two different shareable snacks. Jujyfruits trick your mind with a wild assortment of shapes. The gummy asparagus, tomato, grape, banana, pineapple, raspberry and pea pods shapes are only a tease–the key to their true flavor lies in the color.

t: Amazon.com: Jujyfruits Candy, 3 Ounce, Pack of 8 : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: These small, chewy, fruit flavored candies, whose shapes have nothing to do with their flavors, are really different. It is the candy color that cues the taste. With shapes like asparagus, tomato, grapes, banana, pineapple, raspberry and pea pods, Jujyfruits are truly unique.
